Sergio Venturi, detto il "Principino" - di professione protettore - vive con la prostituta Laura Belmonte, il cui sincero e profondo affetto per lui ÃƒÂ¨ ricambiato sovente con sgarberie e atti di violenza. Un giorno, la donna scompare. Qualche tempo dopo, Sergio acconsente ad ospitare in casa propria Lidia, figlia di un suo amico finito in carcere...........................

[img]http://s19.postimg.org/fzn6g380j/1_story.png[/img]

In Italian a Ã¢â‚¬Å“magnaccioÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ is a pimp, and Il magnaccio deals with a pimp nicknamed the Little Prince who is loved by his live-in prostie, but whose affection he either ignores or violently rebuffs. When she disappears the Prince replaces her, but sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never far from his mind, and this being giallo we know disappearances donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t last. And indeed she turns up again, seemingly by chance, and the dysfunctional lovers get a chance to resolve unfinished businessÃ¢â‚¬â€assuming they donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t kill each other first. The movie stars Franco Citti, Riccardo Salvino, Elina de Witt, and Silvana Venturelli, who we last saw in the Radley Metzger mind trip Esotika Erotika Psicotika.
